function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to gardens, parks, or countryside during COVID-19 lockdown","Impact":"Decreased opportunities for contact with nature, impacting mental and physical well-being","Mitigation":"Increase indoor green spaces and biophilic design elements in buildings","Technologies":"Biophilic design, green facades, green roofs, vertical gardens","People":"Urban dwellers, residents of densely populated areas","Owner":"Architects, building designers"},{"Description":"Concealment of lack of real improvements or effectiveness in 'greening' of architecture","Impact":"Misleading promotion leading to ineffective implementation of biophilic design","Mitigation":"Transparent reporting and evaluation of the effectiveness of green architectural elements","Technologies":"Performance evaluation technologies, transparent monitoring systems","People":"Architects, developers, building owners","Owner":"Architects, academic researchers"},{"Description":"Elusive interpretation of the notion of 'nature' in architectural design","Impact":"Confusion and disagreement on the purpose and application of biophilic design","Mitigation":"Clear definition and consensus on the interpretation of 'nature' in architectural design","Technologies":"Collaborative design platforms, shared knowledge repositories","People":"Architects, urban planners, environmental psychologists","Owner":"Architectural organizations, academia"}]}
